Troy.Pumpkin House: Pumpkin House, also known as Hart Tenant House, is a historic home in Troy, [Rensselaer County, New York. It was built in about 1820 and is a two-story, three-bay Federal period frame residence with a high pitched gable roof parallel to the street. It has a large, two-story rear wing built in two stages, in about 1830 and about 1870.
